bibl.title: assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009.
bibl.note: 21 contributions. - Pp. 8-9: A.D.M. and C.Fl., Preface; - Acknowledgements. - Dress accessories from recent excavations and in museum collections. - Footwear. - Special items of dress accessories. - Research connected to DressID. - Individual research beyond the main theme. - Bibliography. Indices.
bibl.seg: De Moor Antoine and Cäcilia Fluck (Edd.), assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009.
Tielt, Lannoo, 2011, 4°, 317 pp., nombr. ill. coul. ISBN 978-90-209-9936-5. €65.

21 contributions. - Pp. 8-9: A.D.M. and C.Fl., Preface; - Acknowledgements. - Dress accessories from recent excavations and in museum collections. - Footwear. - Special items of dress accessories. - Research connected to DressID. - Individual research beyond the main theme. - Bibliography. Indices.
